definitions: each of two or more words that are spelled identically but have different sounds and meanings, such as tear meaning “rip” and tear meaning “liquid from the eye.”.
shortDefinitions: each of two or more words which are spelled identically but have different sounds and meanings

definitions: each of two or more words that are used to refer to the identical thing in different geographical areas of a speech community, such as submarine sandwich, hoagie, and grinder.
shortDefinitions: each of two or more words which are used to refer to identical thing in different geographical areas of speech community

definitions: each of two words having the same meaning but derived from unrelated sources, for example preface and foreword.
shortDefinitions: each of two words having same meaning but derived from unrelated sources
